ygData.subject: Re: Items poliferation is a sword of damakle over Casters!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Problem is that your twinkage is completely uneven. The equvalent to full bronze in a warrior would be an FBR, a stein, +3 INT earrings, +4 INT necklace,
ygData.messageBody:
Wizard wrote:
>
> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> So what hapends .. to make example i spend some time building a wizard and
> a warrior to 6 lv and i twinked them with items to make a probe.
>
> Warrior with nearly full large bronze and fine stell sword .. Wizard with
> full woven, rts skull, +10 mana earings ect.. Normaly warrior dies on 3
> high blues 100% on this lv .... wizard dont have mana to kill 2 high blue ..
>

Problem is that your twinkage is completely uneven. The equvalent to
full bronze in a warrior would be an FBR, a stein, +3 INT earrings, +4
INT necklace, Savant's Cap, BS gloves, etc.

What you gave your wizard is equvalent to a normal level 10-13 wizard.
Full bronze is good for a mid 20's warrior. Of course he will be more
successfull.

Just as an example, I, at level 26 have +36 INT, +60 mana, +40 HP,
something like +40-50 AC, +11 STR, and some more little boosts I can't
remember right now.

--
Sergey
--

KPS, PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
